name: VHSGAME
description:
MADE FOR WOWIE 2.0 GAME JAM

You are a little dreamy boy in a VHSGAME and you have to find out the secret of the game, and escape the  VHS tape . . .

CONTROLS

__MOVE:                            [ WASD ]   OR   [ARROW KEYS]

__JUMP:                             [ SPACE ]

 __SHOOT:                         [ LEFT MOUSE BUTTON ]

__GRAPPLE:                     [ RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON ]

INFO

The game design is quit old and rusy like a VHS tape. I tired to make the game moody and beautiful. I didn't make the best game controls but I tried to make really fun and enjoyable moody game.

This is my first game jam, and i'm really proud the I managed to finish this game because I never have finished any game that I started.

PLEASE LEAVE FEEDBACK SO I CAN NOW WHAT TO FIX.

HOPE YOU ENJOY THE GAME.
